game.name: Apothecarium: The Renaissance of Evil - Premium Edition
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: During the Middle Ages a terrifying, mysterious disease raged across Italy. It killed thousands of people, whole towns and villages perished together. There were legends of a mythical town of Apothecarium, where the secret to defeating the disease was hidden.
